item.title: github: Upcoming deprecation of select GitHub Copilot models from Claude, Google, and OpenAI
item.description:
GitHub announced on Jan 13, 2026 that it will deprecate select GitHub Copilot models from Claude, Google, and OpenAI as part of routine retirements to prioritize newer, more capable models and maintain a fast, highâ€‘quality Copilot experience.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub now supports social login with Apple
item.description:
GitHub has added social login with Apple (Sign in with Apple), making it easier for iOS developers to sign up and sign in. This builds on GitHub’s earlier social login support for Google.

  • Source: GitHub
